author: Reuters Editorial
title: Samsung heir Lee says spent year in jail on self-reflection
text:
SEOUL, Feb 5 (Reuters) - Samsung Group heir Jay Y. Lee said on Monday he spent his year in jail on “precious” self-reflection and promised to show a better side in future, after a high court suspended his jail sentence in a corruption scandal and set him free.
“Again, I feel sorry to everyone for not showing my best side. And it has been a really precious time for a year reflecting on myself,” Lee told reporters at a detention centre. (Reporting by Haejin Choi, Writing by Ju-min Park; Editing by Nick Macfie)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
